# File lib/ext_ind.rb, line 773
  def pos=(pos)
    if pos < 0
      raise ArgumentError.new("position out of bounds: #{pos}") if pos < -length
      pos += length 
    end
    
    # do something fake for caching so that 

    # the position need not be set (this 

    # works either way)

    if cached? 
      self.cache_pos = pos
    else
      io.pos = (pos * frame_size)
    end
  end
